headline: PPG global leaders transform Boys & Girls Club in Florida, celebrate 10 years of COLORFUL COMMUNITIES program
summary: FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla., February 11, 2025--PPG global leaders transform a Boys & Girls Club in Florida, part of the 10-year celebration of the company's COLORFUL COMMUNITIES® program
